Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This mutation ( 7271T - - > G ) also allows expression of full - length ATM protein at a level comparable with that in unaffected individuals .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| unaffected individuals |

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease entities. The term "unaffected individuals" refers to individuals who do not have a disease or mutation being discussed in the paragraph. Therefore, the only valid disease entity in the paragraph is "unaffected individuals".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
